Message.Title: Very important What Amazon must continue to do
Message.Msg: he lack of comprehensiveness means that Google risks losing shoppers to other comparison shopping sites or to Amazon, even as it tries to keep them. In a shift, more people now start product searches on Amazon instead of Google, according to Forrester data. That is a problem for Google for a few reasons, the biggest of which is that retail searches and search ads are among its biggest businesses. Their strongest play is clearly to customize android and put out a full color tablet that more directly competes with ipad. If they're smart, they'll do what no one else has done: create an android games division optimized and branded for their own hardware. They can start with the casual stuff and move on from there. Then, a well-done wifi-based music player, the most glaring hole in the android line-up. And then, finally, a smartphone.

Message.Title: AMZN price makes no sense
Message.Msg: It is trading on emotion, not concrete numbers. The stratospheric Price Earnings ratio, the razor thin profit margins, the lack of consistent revenue and earnings beat - nothing makes sense. Yet the price keeps on going up... truly bizzare.
